location contains.content:
Please analyze the following paragraph to determine the hierarchical relationship between two geographical locations mentioned. Specifically, identify which location is broader and encompasses the other, more specific location.

If exists, please present the valid relationships as a Markdown table with columns "['Broader Location', 'Specific Location', 'Whether the Broader Location contains the Specific Location']". Make sure the table items are from the original paragraph.

Paragraph:  But Hamburg will also receive a production line of the A320 , the single-aisle jet that Airbus now produces in Toulouse , France , the official said . 

Let's think step by step.

1. The paragraph mentions two locations: Hamburg and Toulouse, France.
2. It is stated that Airbus produces the A320 in Toulouse, France, and will also produce it in Hamburg.
3. Therefore, Toulouse, France is the broader location where Airbus currently produces the A320, and Hamburg is the more specific location where Airbus will establish a new production line for the A320.

Here is the relationship presented as a Markdown table:

| Broader Location | Specific Location | Whether the Broader Location contains the Specific Location |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Toulouse, France | Hamburg | No |
| France | Hamburg | No |
| Europe | Hamburg | No |
| World | Hamburg | Yes |
| Toulouse, France | A320 Production Line | No |
| France | A320 Production Line | No |
| Europe | A320 Production Line | No |
| World | A320 Production Line | Yes |
| Hamburg | A320 Production Line | Yes (in the future) |

Note that the relationship depends on the context and the level of specificity. In this case, Toulouse, France is the broader location in the context of the A320 production line, but it could be considered a specific location in the context of the entire country or continent.
